A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually beautiful\, but plotwise\, it is a huge mess. Rian Johnson did a huge disservice to the rich lore surrounding the original trilogy of SW\, and there are plotholes that are huge enough you could drive a Death Star through it. Most of the humor felt too forced\, though there were several lines that I thought were hilarious. Star Wars Rankings : OSB> ANH = RoTJ\, > TFA\, TLJ = RoTS > TPM > TCW
